title: Sparkling Pool, Pool Lounge Seating, Large Closets, Packing Receiving
posting_body: ['Aslan on the River', '100 Riverview Pl, Jonesboro, GA, 30238', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 38', 'OR Text', '38', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to Aslan on the River!', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1495 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each floor plan from Aslan On The River brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.', 'Our community offers a luxury swimming pool, fitness studio, sports courts, sports field and outdoor kitchens.', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed', 'Breed Restrictions Apply', 'Please Contact Leasing Office For Details', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the monthly rent', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', '12ql3NeX']
